Package org.garret.perst.fulltext

Interface FullTextIndex

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Externalizable, ILoadable, IPersistent, IResource, IStoreable, java.io.Serializable

    public interface FullTextIndex
extends IPersistent, IResource
    Full text search index. This index split document text in words, perform stemming of the words and build inverse index. Full text index is able to execute search queries with logical operators (AND/OR/NOT) and strict match. Returned results are ordered by rank, which includes inverse document frequency (IDF), frequency of word in the document, occurrence kind and nearness of query keywords in the document text.

      Description of full text index keyword

        FullTextSearchResult search(java.lang.String query,
                            java.lang.String language,
                            int maxResults,
                            int timeLimit)
        Parse and execute full text search query
        Parameters:
        query - text of the query
        language - language if the query
        maxResults - maximal amount of selected documents
        timeLimit - limit for query execution time
        Returns:
        result of query execution ordered by rank or null in case of empty or incorrect query

      • searchPrefix

        FullTextSearchResult searchPrefix(java.lang.String prefix,
                                  int maxResults,
                                  int timeLimit,
                                  boolean sort)
        Locate all documents containing words started with specified prefix
        Parameters:
        prefix - word prefix
        maxResults - maximal amount of selected documents
        timeLimit - limit for query execution time
        sort - whether it is necessary to sort result by rank
        Returns:
        result of query execution ordered by rank (if sort==true) or null in case of empty or incorrect query
